title: Meet Cassie, the Usain Bolt of robots
description: Cassie holds the Guinness world record for fastest 100 meter dash for a bipedal robot, paving the way for robots to become more lifelike

title: Cyborg cockroaches are coming, and they just want to help
description: Robotic engineers are scouring the insect world for inspiration, and creating machines that could be used for emergency response, farming and energy.
